[listener]
uid = nagios 
certificate = adhoc
loglevel = info
ip = ::
gid = nagios
logfile = var/log/ncpa_listener.log
port = 5693
pidfile = var/ncpa_listener.pid

[passive]
uid = nagios
handlers = nrds
loglevel = info
gid = nagios
sleep = 300
logfile = var/log/ncpa_passive.log
pidfile = var/ncpa_passive.pid

[nrdp]
token ={token}
hostname =
parent =

[nrds]
url =
CONFIG_VERSION =0
token ={token}
CONFIG_NAME =
CONFIG_OS = None
PLUGIN_DIR=plugins/
UPDATE_CONFIG=1
UPDATE_PLUGINS=1

[api]
community_string ={token}

[plugin directives]
plugin_path = plugins/
{plugins}

[passive checks]
{checks}
